array.name: card_planetaryexploitation
array.item: Get 2 additional resources for the current turn.

array.name: card_hunter
array.item: This single-seater ship makes up the majority of the Heirs fleet. Cheap and reliable, it represents an ideal choice for any commander.

array.name: card_scout
array.item: The Scout is basically a modified Hunter for raids and short-range exploration activities.

array.name: card_raider
array.item: Designed for long-range attacks, they are fully automated, since no crew could ever withstand the acceleration caused by the Argo class engines.

array.name: card_aegis
array.item:
This flying fortress of the size of a small moon, represents the top of the Heirs technology. Equipped with thermonuclear weapons, it can easily destroy a planet or an entire enemy fleet. Its use in battle, however, has serious consequences that every commander must carefully evaluate. In fact, his weapons\' effects often bring down planets to big radioactive balls.

Thermonuclear bombing - When a planet is conquested by this ship, it will give no resources the next turn (stacks with similar effects).
